We have class SemanticSegmentationRasterStore: "A prediction label store for segmentation raster files."

Methods: init, subcomponents activation, empty_labels, get_labels, label_fn, save.

So summary: class responsible for managing storage and retrieval of segmentation raster prediction labels, providing utilities to initialize, activate subcomponents, generate empty label rasters, retrieve current labels, compute label filenames, and persist labels to disk.

Business intent: support machine learning pipelines for semantic segmentation by handling raster label data, enabling downstream analysis, visualization, and model evaluation.

Keywords: semantic segmentation, raster store, prediction labels, label management, save, retrieve, empty label generation, file handling, geospatial, machine learning.
